entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 2.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening and after midnight except snow over higher terrain. Snow beginning overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
